Silver

Name:Silver
Formula:Ag
Atomic Number:47
Group:11
Block:d
Atomic Mass:107.868
Discovery Date:3000BC
Appearance:A relatively soft, shiny metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Tableware
  • Car Alloys
The words for 'silver' and 'money' are the same in fourteen languages or more.
